citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:20 a.m. to 10:50
a.m. on May 31, 2023.
Attempts to make contact with the registrant were done by knocking on the door, honking the GOV's horn, waiting for 30
minutes, and calling and leaving a voicemail. During that time it was relayed that no one would be available to walk the
inspector through the inspection process for the rest of the day.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:20 a.m. to 10:50 
a.m. on May 31, 2023. 
 
Attempts to make contact with the registrant were done by knocking on the door, honking the GOV's horn, waiting for 30 
minutes, and calling and leaving a voicemail. During that time it was relayed that no one would be available to walk the 
inspector through the inspection process for the rest of the day. 
 
 
 
End Section
